argument.name: filter_expn
argument.description: A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value. The default value for the Filter_Expression field in the Query by Expression dialog.

argument.name: order_expn
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records and the default value for the Order_Expression field in the Query by Expression dialog.

argument.name: level
argument.description: Name of the primary table of the level.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUERY_BY_EXPN() method displays the Query by Expression dialog. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.Query_By_Expn()
